name: Random Vehicle Generator 2
description:
Make futuristic vehicle combos in the new vehicle creator or hit the spacebar to generate a vehicle in vehicle generator mode. Change the mood with the light colour shifter and, in the vehicle creator, change the lighting direction with the day/night slider. 

Click anywhere after you've set the sliders otherwise they will move with the camera, sometimes you will encounter a bug where they will move anyway.

This is still a work in progress (you can still play the original if you like), atm there are still some small issues with the model meshes (mainly origin point related) and camera (I wasn't able to clamp the camera movements properly and the camera jitters now for some reason in both modes). 

Controls

First click the game screen to make it active

In Vehicle Generator mode:

Press spacebar to generate a car, press spacebar again to generate another car

In Vehicle Creator mode:

Click the buttons to cycle through the various sections

Camera Controls in both modes

Use arrow keys or WASD to move camera around model

X to zoom out camera 

Z to zoom in camera

Show me some screenshots of the cool cars you've come across.

All assets and programming created by Adrift Dev
